hero.description: At SolutionsBI, we offer technology solutions to help your company grow, innovate, and stand out in the market. Discover our services and find out how we can help boost your business.

questions.question: How can I hire SolutionsBI services?
questions.answer: To hire our services, contact us through our phone number or email.

questions.question: What are SolutionsBI's service hours?
questions.answer: Our service hours are Monday to Friday, from 8 am to 6 pm.

questions.question: Does SolutionsBI offer technical support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer technical support to our clients.

questions.question: Does SolutionsBI offer any discounts for students?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for students.

hero.description: Learn more about our history and how it all started.

timeline.title:
from an innovative
vision to
global impact
timeline.description: Founded in 2019, Solutions BI was born with the mission of transforming data into valuable insights for companies across various sectors. From the beginning, our focus has been on empowering our clients with cutting-edge technological solutions, enabling them to make more informed and strategic decisions. Over the years, we have grown and expanded our operations globally, delivering more than 150 projects in 9 different countries, always maintaining a commitment to excellence and innovation.

events.title: From the Beginning to Scalability
events.description: It all started in 2019 with the printing of some business cards and the first project with a client from RJ. This same client would return to us in 2023. Our first partner joined the team, bringing other projects to continue our growth.

events.title: From Diversification to a New Company
events.description: We diversified our services, operating in sectors such as IT, Medicine, Industries, and Logistics. SolutionsBI is legally established as a company, consolidates its clients, and hires its first employee.

events.title: Globalization
events.description: We are now present in projects on 4 different continents, increasing our team and partnerships.

events.title: Growth
events.description: SolutionsBI is now present in major National and International projects. We have a consolidated and engaged team. At this point, we are already working on projects in Brazil, England, Germany, Portugal, USA, Uruguay, and Barbados.

events.title: Maturation
events.description: In this phase, we created internal processes for financial management, hiring, people, professional growth, and marketing. We actively participate in city projects and close an exclusive international partnership.

events.title: Traction
events.description: Seeking exponential growth, we diversify our services, create our products, and invest in resources to further increase the quality of our service to our clients.

sections.title: Information Collection
sections.description: We do not collect personal information directly from users. However, we may obtain anonymous information about your browsing on our site, including your IP address, browser type used, pages accessed, and time spent on each of them. This information is collected in aggregate form and does not allow individual identification of users.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.description: The anonymous information we collect is primarily intended to improve your experience with us. We use this data to analyze user interaction with the site, allowing us to optimize our services and content. Through these analyses, we can improve the usability and performance of our site for all visitors.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.description: You have full control over your information. You can choose not to participate in our data collection activities by disabling cookies in your browser or choosing not to provide your email. Additionally, you have the right to access and correct the information we have about you. If you wish, you can request a copy of your personal data and correct any errors that may exist. If, at any time, you no longer wish to receive our newsletters, you can unsubscribe using the unsubscribe link available in our emails.

sections.title: Information Security
sections.description: We implement various security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alterations, disclosures, or destructions. We use advanced techniques such as encryption, firewalls, and access controls to ensure the security of your data. Despite all our efforts, it's important to note that no method of data transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and therefore we cannot guarantee the absolute security of information.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.description: We retain the personal information we collect only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy. However, in some cases, data retention may be extended to comply with specific legal or regulatory requirements. When no longer needed for these purposes, the information will be securely deleted.

sections.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
sections.description: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices, technological innovations, or legal requirements. We recommend that you review this page regularly to stay informed about our most recent practices. Any significant changes to this policy will be communicated appropriately to ensure that you are aware of the changes.

description.part1: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy, please contact us through:
description.part2: We are available to clarify any questions and ensure that you have a safe and satisfactory experience with our service.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us at SolutionsBI to learn more about our services and solutions.

1.description: Solutions BI is a technology company specialized in creating customized solutions for companies that want to optimize their processes and increase their efficiency.
